meanings.sent1: She is always unexcitable, never getting worked up over small things.
meanings.sent2: The unexcitable cat remained unfazed by the loud noises outside.
meanings.sent3: Even during the surprise party, he stayed unexcitable, not showing any emotion.
meanings.sent4: Her unexcitable nature was like a steady rock in the storm of emotions around her.
meanings.sent5: The unexcitable demeanor of the security guard made him perfect for the job.

meanings.definition: Remaining calm and composed in stressful situations.
meanings.sent1: In the face of danger, the unexcitable firefighter acted with precision and calm.
meanings.sent2: The unexcitable nurse handled the emergency room chaos with ease.
meanings.sent3: Even when the cake fell, she remained unexcitable and simply laughed it off.
meanings.sent4: His unexcitable attitude was a beacon of stability during the turbulent times.
meanings.sent5: The unexcitable pilot safely landed the plane despite the engine failure.
